author: Liz Hoffman
title: Dina Powell, Former Trump Adviser, Weighs Return to Goldman Sachs
text:
Dina Powell, who until recently served as a top national-security adviser in the White House, is talking to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. about returning to the firm, according to people familiar with the matter.
Ms. Powell spent a decade at Goldman before joining the Trump administration last year, and in recent weeks has discussed coming back, the people said. She is unlikely to resume her old job running Goldmanâ€™s philanthropic arm and its community-development investing business, but rather is discussing a broader global role...
